page.title: 14Wareham Farming.
page.content:
{Swineham Farm. The swineham farm is owned by English China Clay but worked by many differnt farmers.The farmer interviwed does't work the farm any more but lives in the farmhouse there.About 450 dairy and beef cattle are run on the split up farm.The farmhouse is only 6 feet above sea level and much off the farm land is below.It's water table is between 3-6 feet deep in most fields. They are well drained and have to be fertilized regularly.Dung or chemicals are used.The farm is now not very well run because the fileds are not used to full capacity.The fields are mostly used for grazing and hay.They have a pot ash base with ammounts of sand in.
Con'td on Pg 15
